title: About the Championship
intro: The European Korfball Championship 2026 brings together the best teams from across Europe for an exciting week of competition in the heart of Czechia.

history.title: Tournament History
history.content: The European Korfball Championship has been held since 1998 and showcases the highest level of competitive korfball in Europe.

czechia.title: Why Czechia?
czechia.content: Czechia has a rich tradition in korfball and offers world-class facilities across three beautiful Moravian cities.

format.title: Competition Format
format.content: 16 national teams will compete in group stages followed by knockout rounds, culminating in the championship final.
